meanings.sent1: I have five fingers on one hand.
meanings.sent2: The bus arrived at five o'clock sharp.
meanings.sent3: I found five shiny coins on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The five petals of the flower danced in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The recipe called for five cups of flour.

meanings.definition: A game in which players try to hit a ball against a wall in a way that makes it difficult for their opponent to return it.
meanings.sent1: During recess, the children played fives against the school wall.
meanings.sent2: He practiced his fives skills every afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The intense fives match ended in a tie.
meanings.sent4: Her strategic fives shots left her opponent speechless.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the fives ball echoed in the empty court.

meanings.definition: A hand in the game of poker containing five cards of the same suit.
meanings.sent1: She won the round with a perfect fives hand.
meanings.sent2: The fives hand he held was unbeatable.
meanings.sent3: His lucky fives hand made him the champion.
meanings.sent4: The fives hand dealt to her was a rare occurrence.
meanings.sent5: The fives hand he revealed left everyone in awe.
